cookie.title: We use cookies
cookie.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze site traffic.
cookie.necessaryDesc: Required for the website to function properly.
cookie.analyticsDesc: Help us understand how visitors use our website.
cookie.marketingDesc: Used to show relevant ads and measure effectiveness.

home.visaDesc: E-visa, visa on arrival, exemptions, and step-by-step application help.

home.weatherDesc: Best time to visit, regional climates, and what to pack each month.
home.practicalDesc: Currency, tipping, power outlets, safety, and cultural etiquette tips.
home.esimDesc: Stay connected with the best eSIM and SIM card options for travelers.
home.insuranceDesc: Compare plans and find the right coverage for your Vietnam adventure.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introText: ("{0}", "we", "us", or "our") operates the {1} website. This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal information when you use our website.
privacy.informationCollectionText: We may collect certain information automatically when you visit our website, including your IP address, browser type, and pages visited. We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience.
privacy.analyticsText: We use Google Analytics to understand how visitors interact with our website. Google Analytics uses cookies to collect anonymous usage data.
privacy.affiliateLinksText: Our website contains affiliate links to third-party services. When you click these links and make a purchase, we may earn a commission at no extra cost to you.
privacy.contactText: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please contact us through our website.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.acceptanceText: By accessing {0}, you agree to these terms of service. If you do not agree, please do not use our website.
terms.contentText: The information on this website is for general informational purposes only. While we strive for accuracy, travel information may change without notice. Always verify details before your trip.
terms.affiliateDisclosureText: This website participates in affiliate programs. We may earn commissions from qualifying purchases made through links on our site.
terms.limitationOfLiabilityText: {0} shall not be liable for any travel-related decisions made based on information provided on this website.

seo.homeDescription: Your complete {0} travel guide with city guides, local food, practical tips, and more.
